title: As Views Diverge on Universal Jurisdiction’s Scope, Application, Definition Sixth Committee Delegates Urge Further Study ...
text: ( Source : United Nations General Assembly ) While speakers agreed on the need to end impunity for the gravest international crimes, views diverged on how broad the application of universal jurisdiction should be towards that end and whether
